articles.author: Louis Mian, Sharon Braithwaite, Ingrid Formanek, Richard Roth
articles.title: People eating ‘grass and peanut shells’ in Darfur, UN says, as hunger crisis engulfs war-ravaged Sudan - CNN
articles.description: Time is running out to prevent starvation in Darfur, in western Sudan, a UN agency has warned, as escalating violence devastates the African nation.
articles.content:
Time is running out to prevent starvation in Darfur, in western Sudan, a UN agency has warned, as escalating violence devastates the African nation.
People have been forced to consume grass and pean… [+3032 chars]
